XI.iii.1.D.3.j
.
Required Application for Headstone Reimbursement
A claim for reimbursement for a non-government headstone or marker is made on
VA Form 21P-8834
,
Application for Reimbursement of Headstone or Marker Expenses
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
